title: Jonzing for some Moxie calendar goodness?
body: It's not much of a secret by now, but if you don't know what we're showing in December try here, here (scroll down), or here! The paper calendars should hopefully be ready by tomorrow. Thanks for your patience. Oh, and if you're wondering when I'm ever going to get around to fixing all the broken links on this site... keep wondering. Truth is, I'm redesigning the entire thing. Stick with me though, folks... it'll be worth the wait.
author: Dan

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: A re-design?!?! But this one is so amazing!  I totally forgot what the old design looked like. You should show a picture or something or have a link to the old style and then one for this so we can watch the Evolution of the Moxie Blog.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: You mean the Intelligent Design of the Moxie Blog.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Oh yes, the Intelligent Design by the Flying Spaghetti Monster Moxie Blog.

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: mirrormask is amazing. i'm no comic book (excuse me graphic novel) nerd, but this movie is spectacular. think labyrinth for the 21st century.

comments.author: Oz
comments.body: Off topic:  Did you hear that Arrested Development was canceled?  Just found out myself today, and I know you were a fan....

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: So was Family Guy - but it was revived! Let's hope the same for AD.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
Arrested Development Deux...

...or ADD, which is appropriate somehow.

comments.author: erin
comments.body:
oooh december is looking like a fine moxie month...
noverber was pretty great too. as well as october... and september... who could forever september?!

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: I'm psyched you guys are getting "the Wal-Mart movie." It should be required viewing to be an American. Heh heh.

comments.author: Ole
comments.body: I'd love to see arrows on the "Showing Today At the Moxie" page that would let me go forward one date at a time to see the daily listings and show times.
